description.zh-cn: 男，汉族，中国政治人物。曾任中共中央纪委副秘书长、广西壮族自治区人民政府副主席，现任中共广西壮族自治区党委常委、政法委书记，自治区法学会会长。
description.en: Male, Han ethnicity, a Chinese political figure. He previously served as Deputy Secretary-General of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection, Vice Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region. He currently serves as a Standing Committee Member of the CPC Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Committee, Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission, and President of the Guangxi Law Society.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal disciplinary body of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 广西壮族自治区人民政府

zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国广西壮族自治区的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 广西壮族自治区国有资产监督管理委员会

zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区人民政府特设直属机构，代表自治区政府履行出资人职责。
description.en: A special directly-affiliated institution of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, which performs the duties of an investor on behalf of the regional government.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在广西壮族自治区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.en: The functional department of the CPC Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Committee that leads and manages political and legal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 广西壮族自治区法学界、法律界的群众团体和学术团体。
description.en: A public and academic association for the legal and law communities in the Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，广西壮族自治区人民政府副主席。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, Vice Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任广西壮族自治区人民政府副主席。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, former Vice Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共广西壮族自治区党委常委。
description.en: A Chinese political figure, former Standing Committee Member of the CPC Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Committee.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

position.en: Deputy Secretary-General, Director of the Research Office

description.zh-cn: 根据Wikitext，苗庆旺曾任中共中央纪委副秘书长，及中共中央纪委研究室主任。
description.en: According to the Wikitext, Miao Qingwang served as Deputy Secretary-General of the CPC Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and Director of its Research Office.

description.en: Served as Party Committee Secretary of the State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region.

description.en: Currently serves as a Standing Committee Member of the CPC Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Committee.

description.en: Currently serves as Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the CPC Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Committee.

description.zh-cn: 现任广西壮族自治区法学会会长。

relationships.source: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会政法委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党广西壮族自治区委员会

description.zh-cn: 政法委是党委领导和管理政法工作的职能部门。
description.en: The Political and Legal Affairs Commission is a functional department under the leadership and management of the Party Committee for political and legal affairs.

description.zh-cn: 2024年7月，苗庆旺接替何文浩担任中共广西壮族自治区党委常委职务。
description.en: In July 2024, Miao Qingwang succeeded He Wenhao as a Standing Committee Member of the CPC Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region Committee.

description.zh-cn: 2022年7月，苗庆旺与凌志峰一同被任命为广西壮族自治区人民政府副主席。
description.en: In July 2022, Miao Qingwang was appointed Vice Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region along with Ling Zhifeng.

description.zh-cn: 2022年7月，苗庆旺被任命为广西壮族自治区政府副主席，与此同时周成方不再担任此职务。
description.en: In July 2022, Miao Qingwang was appointed Vice Chairman of the People's Government of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, while Zhou Chengfang ceased to hold this position.
